name: Circle Clicker (kobze)
description:
Welcome to Circle Clicker, the only game where you can lose circles in a factory fire! Created by Kobze Games :D Have fun playing! Known bugs
  • Shops stop working after buying two of them
  • Pressing Load Game with no save makes you unable to save

Please take these bugs into consideration and don't try to use them because they are bugs and might ruin your experience. Thank you.
